definitions.title: n.pr.m. 1.
definitions.body: in Edom Ge 36:13, Ge 36:17, 1Ch 1:37 usu. Some.
third son of Jesse 1Sa 16:9, 1Sa 17:13, Sam(m)a, LXXL Samaa; v. [[שִׁמְעָא]], [[שִׁמְעָה]], [[שִׁמְעִי]].
Samaia(v), etc., heroes of David:

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: v:1Ch 11:25 = [[שַׁמּוֹת]] 1Ch 11:27, Samawq, Sam(m)wq; prob. also [[שַׁמְהוּת]] 1Ch 27:8. p 1030,1035
